summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Project Management MVP application. All core functionality working perfectly including project creation, dashboard statistics, project detail views, API endpoints, database integration, and responsive design.
passed_tests: All 39 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Project detail view with all tabs (Overview, Resources, Milestones, Expenses, Documents)
Project lifecycle stage management and display
Navigation between dashboard and project detail views
Database integration for project storage and retrieval
Responsive UI components across mobile, tablet, and desktop
Real-time dashboard updates after project creation
Tab navigation in project detail view
action_item_for_E1: No action items required. The Project Management MVP is fully functional and ready for production use. All requested features are working correctly.
